Sir Gawain and the Green Knight, Pearl and Sir Orfeo
The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
The Lord of the Rings (film series)
The Lord of the Rings Online: War of Three Peaks

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}

==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast#Tolkien Society tradition|Birthday Toast]].
* '''[[16 January|16]] - [[Christopher Tolkien]], third son of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies at the age of ninety-five.'''
* '''[[January 23|23]]''' - [[Barbara Remington]], cover artist on some American editions, dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 281]]'' is published.

==February==
*'''[[February 7|7]]''' - Actor [[Orson Bean]] dies.
*'''[[February 16|16]]''' - la BnF's exhibition "[https://www.bnf.fr/fr Tolkien, voyage en Terre du Milieu]" closes.

==March==
*'''[[14 March|14]]''' - Filming for the first season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' begins.
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 282]]'' is published.

==April==
* '''[[15 April|15]]''' - [[Sean Arnold]], who would play [[Odo Proudfoot]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1981 radio series)]], dies.
*'''[[16 April|16]]''' - Animator [[Gene Deitch]], director of [[The Hobbit (1967 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1967 film)]] dies.
* '''[[23 April|23]]''' - Actor [[Bruce Allpress]] dies.
* '''[[30 April|30]]''' - The deluxe edition of ''[[Sir Gawain and the Green Knight, Pearl and Sir Orfeo#2020 Deluxe edition|Sir Gawain and the Green Knight: with Pearl and Sir Orfeo]]'' is published.

==May==
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 283]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Mallorn 60]]'' is published.

==June==
* '''[[9 June|9]]''' - ''[[The Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[19 June|19]]''' - [[Ian Holm]], actor who played [[Bilbo Baggins]] and voiced [[Frodo Baggins]], dies.
* '''[[25 June|25]]''' - A new illustrated edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published.

==July==
* '''[[4 July|4]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] Seminar is held online due to the [[wikipedia:COVID-19 pandemic|Covid-19 pandemic]].
* '''[[19 July|19]]''' - ''[[Middle-earth, or There and Back Again]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 284]]'' is published.

==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2021]]'' is published.
* '''[[4 September|4]]''' - A second edition of ''[[The First and Second Ages]]'' is published.
* '''[[18 September|18]] - [[20 September|20]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2020]] held online due to the [[wikipedia:COVID-19 pandemic|Covid-19 pandemic]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 285]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[1 October|1]]''' - A new illustrated edition of ''[[Unfinished Tales]]'' is published.
* '''[[20 October|20]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: War of Three Peaks]]'' is released online.
* '''[[22 October|22]]''' - American author [[Richard A. Lupoff]] dies.
* '''[[29 October|29]]''' - The Centenary Edition of ''[[Letters from Father Christmas]]'' is published.

==November==
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 286]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Mallorn 61]]'' is published.

==December==
* '''[[2 December|2]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit (film series)|The Hobbit]]'' film series are released in remastered 4k edition on [[Wikipedia:Ultra HD Blu-ray|Ultra HD Blu-ray]].
* '''[[15 December|15]]''' - The [[Lambengolmor (mailing list)|Lambengolmor mailing list]] is closed down.
